title: Why almost every post is downvoted to oblivion?
body:
Every post I come across usually has at least 40 down votes , and while I do agree this may be just a random bot squad , it's still a huge problem because the post itself may no longer appear on the main page , unless you scroll down pretty far or search for it in other sections.

I feel like this may be a Riot scheme too , since many complains about the state of the game have been posted lately , far more than in the previous seasons and they might not be happy about it ,especially when you take into consideration their declining player base.

If anything , the boards can serve as a review service for Riot when taking into account the majority of the posts being about the game.I really don't want to sound biased , but when many revolting posts have been well received by the community and many people agreed with them ( 70 +) , a couple of 50 down votes may make the person reading them think twice , despite the fact that those up votes didn't even come from a human.
